products.title: Brookstone Ivory Roman Blind
products.description: The brookstone roman blind in ivory is pure, understated elegance. The geometrical shapes will grace your window without eclipsing the rest of your decor. The pale contrasting hues are spun from the finest fusion of yarns, giving you faith that youre not only hitting the design mark but that this blind is also perfect for numerous windows and rooms. Product id: db-rom1097 fabric colour: ivory material: 60% cotton 40% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Bergen Ochre Yellow Roman Blind
products.description: This fryetts design bergen fabric is currently on trend in the uk. Printed in a fantastic yellow ochre which is highly desirable in todays home interiors. Suitable for both the traditional and contemporary home, an ideal choice for homeowners who love to bring a more modern feel their interiors. All their romans blinds are made here in their own factory in west yorkshire. Each item made is quality checked and comes with a five-year guarantee.

products.title: Bengal Tiger Velour Twilight Roman Blind
products.description: Bring the indian jungle home with their stylish, plush-feel bengal tiger velour twilight roman blind. This deep night-blue fabric, uses luscious green shaded foliage to frame the beautiful, stalking bengal tiger. A firm favourite with their interior designer team this year, immortalise this famous tiger on this luxury velveteen velour roman blind for years to come. At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why this roman blind comes with their free five year guarantee and customer-first service.

products.title: Bari Spc, Rhino - Roller Blind
products.description: The bari spc in rhino features a distinct material with a plentiful and compelling texture, due to the high quality stitching. This substantial fabric forms a contemporary window display with a simple rolling mechanism, and in modern, denim blue shade. Form a cool and contemporary scheme by incorporating the rhino with stark white, dove grey, and matching navy blue components. Layering the subtly textured blind with contrasting cottons in these subdued hues will help to produce a plentiful decor with harmonising shades.

products.title: Bari Spc, Mischka - Roller Blind
products.description: Form a contemporary haven with the bari spc in mischka, with its compelling texture and modern dove grey shade. The exceptional fashioning used to form this dense, distinctive blind creates an alluring feel and its dainty stitching makes for a modern-look window display full of personality. Blend the mischka with a chic collection of whites, charcoals, and subdued greys to generate a modern colour scheme with a subtle monochrome influence.

products.title: Bari Spc, Merino - Roller Blind
products.description: Perfect for creating a sophisticated look, the exquisite bari spc in merino features an elegant shade of cream on a resilient cloth adorned with textured stitching. This graceful blind also offers a valuable solar protective coating which helps to keep the room at a comfortable temperature, whatever the time of year. Present the merino in your master bedroom with a soothing palette of creamy tones and compelling golden hues.

products.title: Bari Spc, Coconut - Roller Blind
products.description: Perfect for generating a sophisticated and tasteful dcor scheme, the bari spc in coconut features a sumptuous cream shade and luxurious detail. The fine stitching and threads create a subtle and modest texture with a luxury effect and tons of compelling style. Showcase the coconut in your lounge or dining room to form a classy and refined effect with plush fabrics and humble colour. Blend this exquisite cream tone with lavish fabrics and soft furnishings in similar neutral tones, adding golden embroidery and gilded features to finish the look with a touch of luxe.

products.title: Bari Spc, Manatee - Roller Blind
products.description: Feature the bari spc in manatee within your home for a substantial blind that is both attractive and functional. The innovative solar protective coating contained in this popular range helps to maintain a comfortable temperature within the room by reflecting the sun's heat. And all with a contemporary, cool grey finish to accommodate any surrounding. For a teenager's bedroom, complement the manatee with a white and cobalt surrounding, forming a modern-day palette with a distinct style.

products.title: Bari Spc, Governor Bay - Roller Blind
products.description: For a colourful and creative blind, choose the bari spc in governor bay, showcasing a punchy cobalt shade and individualistic detailing. The dainty stitching and illusive threads help to create a modest yet eye-catching pattern with compelling texture and modern style. Use the contemporary governor bay within a teenager's bedroom for a distinctive feature full of captivating colour. Create a modern scheme with a milder background of white and dusky grey, including cobalt and slate grey fabrics and furnishings to form a continual dcor arrangement with bolder features.

products.title: Bari Spc, Pure - Roller Blind
products.description: From the popular bari spc range, the pure is a modern roller-blind produced from a selection of quality threads to form a distinct look and subtle texture. The sturdy yet paper-feel fabric and dainty stitching creates a modern feature in a refined and elegant cream shade. Pair this substantial cloth with opulent linens or plush velvety fabrics to produce classic style with compelling textures. Why not mingle the brilliant pure with rich wine hues and golden embellishments for a lavish look with an elegant colour combination? Bari spc, pure - roller blind from the popular bari spc range, the pure is a modern roller-blind produced from a selection of quality threads to form a distinct look and subtle texture.

products.title: Bari Spc, Cararra - Roller Blind
products.description: For a sophisticated look with practical benefits, opt for the popular bari spc in cararra. This exquisite cloth features a unique solar protective coating which helps to keep the room cool by reflecting the sun's heat. The dainty stitching creates a captivating texture, providing an elegant window display perfect for any room in the home. Feature the cararra in your master bedroom, layering with plush golden hues and honeyed fabrics to create an enthralling dcor scheme with warm and welcoming tones.

products.title: Bari Spc, Tuscany - Roller Blind
products.description: The bari spc collection is an attractive as well as practical range of quality blinds, with an invaluable solar protective coating. Feature the tuscany edition within any room to produce an elegant window display that also helps to maintain a cool and comfortable temperature throughout the summer months. Present the tuscany in your master bedroom for a sophisticated dcor scheme with punchy colour and compelling texturing.

products.title: Bari Spc, Sienna - Roller Blind
products.description: Feature the charming bari spc in sienna within your home, offering a unique solar protective coating that helps to keep a constant, comfortable temperature. By reflecting the sun before it enters the room, this beneficial property is ideal for a south-facing room, whilst also providing a sophisticated window display. Transform your master bedroom into a peaceful and classy haven by incorporating the sienna with a complementing palette of taupe, caramel, and chocolate.

products.title: Bari Spc, Astra - Roller Blind
products.description: Ideal for a south-facing room, the revolutionary bari spc in astra contains a valuable solar protective coating, which reflects the sun and helps to maintain a constant, comfortable temperature. This exquisite cream shade is sure to add a compelling effect, with its modest sense of style and distinctive texturing. Transform your lounge into a serene haven by including the astra with an array of neutral and modest tones.

products.title: Bari Spc, Perano - Roller Blind
products.description: Feature the contemporary bari spc in perano within your home for a burst of soothing cornflower blue with a refreshing quality and modern style. The contrast of the blind's substantial texture and subtle shade creates a distinctive look that offers chic style and, due to its simple rolling mechanism, functional practicality. Breathe life and light into a modern, all-white kitchen by including the perano.

products.title: Origin Deluxe, Solitaire - Venetian Blind
products.description: The origin deluxe range has been expanded to included solitaire: a natural and gentle blend of white and light grey that flows into your home to create a unique homely visual. By combining bespoke craft with a natural tone, every slat brings an air of relaxation that will instantly make you and your guests feel at home. Origin deluxe, solitaire - venetian blind the origin deluxe range has been expanded to included solitaire: a natural and gentle blend of white and light grey that flows into your home to create a unique homely visual.

products.title: Origin Deluxe, African Blackwood - Venetian Blind
products.description: The ultimate in luxury, the origin deluxe african blackwood offers all of the style and functionality of the standard range, yet with a cool, designer look, with its thick louvres and sleek, jet black finish. And, as well as a matching pelmet and rail, it comes with coordinated, high quality ladder tapes. There is no colour combination more glamorous than that of black and gold, so embrace the luxe and pair the two tones together in a contemporary dining room.

products.title: Infusion Asc Saffron Perfect Fit
products.description: Infusion asc saffron perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their infusion asc range, where advanced solar control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The asc refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the summer and retaining heat in the winter.

products.title: Amor White Lotus With Haze Soft Grey Double Roller Blind
products.description: Combining two of their most popular roller blinds in one, this amor white lotus and haze soft grey double roller blind gives you the best of both worlds. Keep the voile down in the day for light and privacy, then at night lower the blackout amor soft grey to block out the light. Their double roller blinds give you total control and practicality, with both blinds installed on the same bracket you won't need to worry about installing twice.

products.title: Zambezi 25mm Cloud Real Wood Perfect Fit Blind
products.description: A soft grey shade, this zambezi cloud perfect fit blind is practical and oh-so stylish. Add a soft splash of colour to your home with this grey blind, and accessories with wooden accessroies for a homey look. Using and easy clip-on fitting system, this perfect fit wooden blind is both drill and screw-free, and provides a child-safe option for your upvc windows or doors. At swift direct blinds quality is important to us, which is why your new perfect fit blind is hand-made with quality materials, in their yorkshire workshop by their team of experts, and delivered direct to your door.

products.title: Hive Blackout Barley Perfect Fit
products.description: Hive blackout barley perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their hive blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The "hiveblackout"range has a backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Blackout fabric: yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.
